descriptions.Adventurous Hunters work together agains: Adventurous Hunters work together against the lone Yeti. Watch out, if the Yeti eats 4 meat it's time to run!
descriptions.Face off in a series of six-on-six fight: Face off in a series of six-on-six fights as Mei, who is equipped with a powerful Snowball Blaster. This weapon only has one shot, but can be reloaded at snow piles.
descriptions.Defeat the enemy team with every player: Defeat the enemy team with every player using heroes that randomly change upon respawn.
Power up and embrace the chaos.
descriptions.Climb to the top of the scoreboard. The: Climb to the top of the scoreboard. The deadliest team wins.
descriptions.Defeat the enemy team without any limits: Defeat the enemy team without any limits on hero selection.
descriptions.Rise up the ranks and compete with the b: Rise up the ranks and compete with the best Lúcioballers in the world!
descriptions.3v3 team match of Lúcioball. Whoever sco: 3v3 team match of Lúcioball. Whoever scores the most goals wins!
descriptions.Two teams of six players compete to capt: Two teams of six players compete to capture the enemy team's flag while defending their own.
descriptions.Defeat the enemy team in a low-gravity e: Defeat the enemy team in a low-gravity environment.
descriptions.Climb to the top of the scoreboard. The: Climb to the top of the scoreboard. The deadliest hero wins.
descriptions.Two teams of six players compete on Liji: Two teams of six players compete on Lijiang Tower to capture the enemy team's flag while defending their own.
descriptions.Rise up the ranks and compete with the b: Rise up the ranks and compete with the best Capture The Flag players in the world!
descriptions.Two teams of six players compete on Ayut: Two teams of six players compete on Ayutthaya to capture the enemy team's flag while defending their own.
descriptions.Face off in a series of one on one fight: Face off in a series of one on one fights. Both players pick from the same set of heroes in every round.
Face off in a series of one on one fights. Both players use the same random hero in every round.
descriptions.Compete as a team of three players in a: Compete as a team of three players in a series of fights.
descriptions.Compete as a team of six players in a se: Compete as a team of six players in a series of fights, where successful heroes are removed from later rounds.
descriptions.Capture the payload and escort it to the: Capture the payload and escort it to the destination!
descriptions.Escort Junkrat and Roadhog's special del: Escort Junkrat and Roadhog's special delivery to the Queen of Junkertown!
descriptions.Defeat the enemy team on the Horizon Lun: Defeat the enemy team on the Horizon Lunar Colony map.
descriptions.Welcome to Blizzard World. Are you prepa: Welcome to Blizzard World. Are you prepared for the most epic theme park experience... ever?
descriptions.Compete as a team of six Doomfists in a: Compete as a team of six Doomfists in a series of fights.
descriptions.Dr. Jamison Junkenstein wants revenge. F: Dr. Jamison Junkenstein wants revenge. Four wanderers have come to stop him...
descriptions.Rise up the ranks and compete with the b: Rise up the ranks and compete with the best Elimination players in the world!
descriptions.Notoriously the site of the \"Venice Inc: Notoriously the site of the "Venice Incident," conflict has returned to the streets and canals of Rialto.
descriptions.Dr. Junkenstein and his minions march up: Dr. Junkenstein and his minions march upon the castle.
descriptions.The minions of Dr. Junkenstein grow stro: The minions of Dr. Junkenstein grow stronger.
descriptions.Fallen wanderers will be immortalized in: Fallen wanderers will be immortalized in legend.
descriptions.Blackwatch heads to Venice to deal with: Blackwatch heads to Venice to deal with a new threat.
descriptions.A team of four heroes heads to Venice to: A team of four heroes heads to Venice to deal with a new threat.
descriptions.An Overwatch strike team is sent to libe: An Overwatch strike team is sent to liberate King's Row from Null Sector.
descriptions.Fight as a team of four heroes to libera: Fight as a team of four heroes to liberate King's Row from Null Sector.
descriptions.If all players prefer Hunter, one will b: If all players prefer Hunter, one will be chosen randomly as the Yeti.
descriptions.Completing games as hunter will increase: Completing games as hunter will increase your chances to be chosen as the Yeti.
descriptions.Rise up the ranks and compete with the b: Rise up the ranks and compete with the best Deathmatch players in the world!
descriptions.Two teams compete to take control of Bus: Two teams compete to take control of Busan.
descriptions.Climb to the top of the scoreboard with: Climb to the top of the scoreboard with every player using heroes that randomly change upon respawn.
descriptions.A team of four heroes heads to Havana to: A team of four heroes heads to Havana to deal with a new threat.
descriptions.A new Overwatch strike team heads to Hav: A new Overwatch strike team heads to Havana to capture a critical Talon asset.
descriptions.Two teams of six players compete on Busa: Two teams of six players compete on Busan to capture the enemy team's flag while defending their own.
descriptions.Eliminated heroes are frozen and may be: Eliminated heroes are frozen and may be thawed by allies. Freeze all enemies to win the round. Successful heroes are removed from later rounds.
descriptions.Head to Paris and battle at the heart of: Head to Paris and battle at the heart of the Omnic Resistance.
descriptions.Play through a set list of heroes in a d: Play through a set list of heroes in a deathmatch environment. Each time you get a kill, you swap to the next hero. The first player to get through their list wins.
descriptions.Take the fight to the streets of Havana!: Take the fight to the streets of Havana!
descriptions.A free-for-all battle against identical: A free-for-all battle against identical heroes!
descriptions.Defeat the enemy team with no role limit: Defeat the enemy team with no role limits on hero selection.
descriptions.Face off in a free-for-all snowball figh: Face off in a free-for-all snowball fight as Mei, who is equipped with a powerful Snowball Blaster. This weapon has limited ammo, but can be reloaded at snow piles.
descriptions.Two teams of six players compete in a fa: Two teams of six players compete in a fast-paced match to capture the enemy team's flag while defending their own.
descriptions.Storm Rising. Only damage heroes. Healin: Storm Rising. Only damage heroes. Healing is reduced. Heal yourself by doing damage.
descriptions.Uprising. Players have reduced health an: Uprising. Players have reduced health and increased damage.
descriptions.Retribution. Only critical hits do damag: Retribution. Only critical hits do damage.
Uprising. Enemies drop lava on death.
Storm Rising. Some enemies are enraged. Killing them spreads the rage.
descriptions.Retribution. Enemies can only be damaged: Retribution. Enemies can only be damaged if a player is nearby.
descriptions.3v3 team match of Lúcioball featuring no: 3v3 team match of Lúcioball featuring nonstop, chaotic, multi-ball action.
descriptions.Defeat the enemy team with almost no lim: Defeat the enemy team with almost no limits on hero selection.
descriptions.Rise up the ranks and compete with the b: Rise up the ranks and compete with the best players in the world with no role limits on hero selection.
descriptions.Only 3 players, but they deal more damag: Only 3 players, but they deal more damage.
Some enemies spawn Shock-Tires on death.
descriptions.Rise up the ranks and compete with the b: Rise up the ranks and compete with the best players in the world with no limits on hero selection.
descriptions.Gain points by killing the Target to cla: Gain points by killing the Target to claim their bounty and become the Target yourself, raising your health and ultimate meter to full. Earn bonus points by killing non-Target heroes as the Target.
descriptions.Retribution. Damaging enemies heals othe: Retribution. Damaging enemies heals other enemies.
descriptions.Storm Rising. Enemies damage nearby play: Storm Rising. Enemies damage nearby players.
